description: Looking for paper cups for your coffee shop or cafe? All our paper cups are made from sustainably sourced materials and work with our matching coffee cup lids. Bulk pricing available with free UK delivery on orders over £100.

description: Need a pizza box for your pizzeria or takeaway? Our kraft pizza boxes come in four sizes to fit every pizza from 7 inch pizza box for kids portions to 16 inch family size.
